Bonus Program

The more exchanges you make, the higher your discount in our affiliate program. And also, the discount can be increased by performing various tasks described on this page.
How to Earn
0 1 3 9 1 0
Your bonus points
15 % discount
For any exchange

How to earn?

Register and exchange cryptocurrency. After each exchange, we'll give you bonus points. The more points - the higher your discount at the next exchange. We have 6 levels of discount in our loyalty program: 3%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 15% respectively. The first level does not require any exchange at all, you just need to register in the service.

After each exchange you will receive points in the amount of 5% of the amount of exchange, equals USD. For example: you exchange 1000 USD you will get 50 points.

  • 1 Level 0 points
  • 2 Level 500 points
  • 3 Level 1500 points
  • 4 Level 5000 points
  • 5 Level 15000 points
  • 6 Level 50000 points
More points - higher discount!

How does the discount work?

Let's look at an example at the "Watchman" level with a 10% discount. Suppose the commission for the current transaction is 2.5%.
In total, when exchanging for you, the commission will be made up by the formula: 2.5% - 2.5*10/100 = 2,25%
